item.title: Avoid using the following words on your resume: CareerBuilder
item.description: A CareerBuilder survey found that almost 70% of hiring managers spend less than two minutes looking at resumes, meaning word choice is critical for job seekers. Rosemary Haefner, CareerBuilder’s VP of human resources, advises using strong action verbs that highlight specific experiences, skills, and achievements. She cautions against subjective terms and clich√©s because they fail to convey concrete information. For example, instead of claiming to be “results-driven,” demonstrate actual results.
